paper_abstract: In this paper we prove that the Minimum Latency Aggregation Scheduling (MLAS) problem in the Signal-to-Interference-Noise-Ratio (SINR) model is APX-hard in the uniform power model. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on the complexity of minimum latency data aggregation scheduling with uniform power in physical interference model
